posts.title: GitNote
posts.text:
git使用技巧

可视化的分支情况展示

git-gui或者使用第三方的软件git初次提交 20190316git-log01
使用ssh pull到远程git上
问题1

这样的simple-push需要一个默认的远程仓库
$ git push
fatal: The current branch master has no upstream branch.
To push the current branch and set the remote as upstream, use

    git push --set-upstream origin master


问题2

连不上
chenism@DESKTOP-MDQ8IPT MINGW64 /d/CODE/CRX/WebClip (master)
$ git push --set-upstream origin master
CreateProcessW failed error:193
ssh_askpass: posix_spawn: Unknown error
Host key verification failed.
fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

Please make sure you have the correct access rights
and the repository exists.

解决：
先确保git-config中的用户名正确；修改git config配置文件 - 专注于cocos+unity+服务器全栈 - CSDN博客
在github用户界面完成ssl设置；第一次在GitHub上提交代码 - dongxiaocong的专栏 - CSDN博客
'用户名/.ssh/'目录下应该有known-hosts文件，可以通过以下方式生成；GitHub SSH Keys的配置和问题解决 - 简书


chenism@DESKTOP-MDQ8IPT MINGW64 /d/CODE/CRX/WebClip (master)
$ ssh -T git@github.com
The authenticity of host 'github.com (192.30.253.112)' can't be established.
RSA key fingerprint is SHA256:nThbg6kXUpJWGl7E1IGOCspRomTxdCARLviKw6E5SY8.
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yes
Warning: Permanently added 'github.com,192.30.253.112' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.
Hi cn-chenium! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.


git增量push 20190316git-log03

编辑，例如向文件夹中添加一个 README


chenism@DESKTOP-MDQ8IPT MINGW64 /d/CODE/CRX/WebClip (master)
$ git status
On branch master
Your branch is up to date with 'origin/master'.

Untracked files:
(use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)

        README.md

nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track)


添加到缓冲区


chenism@DESKTOP-MDQ8IPT MINGW64 /d/CODE/CRX/WebClip (master)
$ git add README.md


提交到本地仓库


chenism@DESKTOP-MDQ8IPT MINGW64 /d/CODE/CRX/WebClip (master)
$ git commit -m "add README.md"
[master 49e879d] add README.md
 1 file changed, 81 insertions(+)
 create mode 100644 README.md


PUSH到远程仓库


chenism@DESKTOP-MDQ8IPT MINGW64 /d/CODE/CRX/WebClip (master)
$ git push -u origin master
Enumerating objects: 4, done.
Counting objects: 100% (4/4), done.
Delta compression using up to 4 threads
Compressing objects: 100% (3/3), done.
Writing objects: 100% (3/3), 2.11 KiB | 720.00 KiB/s, done.
Total 3 (delta 1), reused 0 (delta 0)
remote: Resolving deltas: 100% (1/1), completed with 1 local object.
To github.com:cn-chenium/WebClip.git
   177f832..49e879d  master -> master
Branch 'master' set up to track remote branch 'master' from 'origin'.


git push origin与git push -u origin master的区别 - 水木神舟10 - 博客园
origin
-u

git基础知识

一张图看懂开源许可协议，开源许可证GPL、BSD、MIT、Mozilla、Apache和LGPL的区别 - newcaoguo - 博客园

git常用命令
本地仓库和远程仓库不是完全对应的；一个本地仓库经过配置也可以推送到多个不同的远程仓库；分支

查看所有分支：git branch -a
更改分支名称：

git branch -m old_branch new_branch # Rename branch locally 
git push origin :old_branch # Delete the old branch 
git push --set-upstream origin new_branch # Push the new branch, set local branch to track the new remote


删除本地分支：git branch --delete <branch_name>


在git仓库配置码云的远程仓库

注：与github类似，在git项目中记录的提交，用户名将如同git config --global user.name/email配置的一致，而在gitee网站查看对应的远程仓库，只要当前提交的email是这个用户注册且确认过的邮箱，都显示为当前gitee用户名；
吐槽一下：我项目简介里写“汉化版”，码云都给我提示“含有敏感词：‘汉化’...”；

PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git remote -v
origin  https://github.com/owxc/cmake-examples.git (fetch)
origin  https://github.com/owxc/cmake-examples.git (push)
upstream        https://github.com/ttroy50/cmake-examples.git (push)
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git remote add gitee https://gitee.com/owxc/cmake-examples-cn.git
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git remote -v
gitee   https://gitee.com/owxc/cmake-examples-cn.git (fetch)
gitee   https://gitee.com/owxc/cmake-examples-cn.git (push)
origin  https://github.com/owxc/cmake-examples.git (fetch)
origin  https://github.com/owxc/cmake-examples.git (push)
upstream        https://github.com/ttroy50/cmake-examples.git (fetch)
upstream        https://github.com/ttroy50/cmake-examples.git (push)
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git pull gitee zh-cn
remote: Enumerating objects: 9, done.
remote: Counting objects: 100% (9/9), done.
remote: Total 5 (delta 3), reused 0 (delta 0)
Unpacking objects: 100% (5/5), done.
From https://gitee.com/owxc/cmake-examples-cn
 * branch            zh-cn      -> FETCH_HEAD
 * [new branch]      zh-cn      -> gitee/zh-cn
Updating 77cb253..43173e6
Fast-forward
 01-basic/A-hello-cmake/README.adoc | 2 +-
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git config --system --list
http.sslcainfo=C:/Program Files/Git/mingw64/ssl/certs/ca-bundle.crt
http.sslbackend=openssl
diff.astextplain.textconv=astextplain
filter.lfs.clean=git-lfs clean -- %f
filter.lfs.smudge=git-lfs smudge -- %f
credential.helper=manager
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git config --global --list
filter.lfs.required=true
filter.lfs.clean=git-lfs clean -- %f
filter.lfs.smudge=git-lfs smudge -- %f
filter.lfs.process=git-lfs filter-process
user.email=chenium@hotmail.com
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git config --global user.email owxc@outlook.com
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git config --global --list
filter.lfs.required=true
filter.lfs.clean=git-lfs clean -- %f
filter.lfs.smudge=git-lfs smudge -- %f
filter.lfs.process=git-lfs filter-process
user.name=owxc
user.email=owxc@outlook.com
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples> git push gitee zh-cn
Enumerating objects: 10, done.
Counting objects: 100% (10/10), done.
Delta compression using up to 4 threads
Compressing objects: 100% (6/6), done.
Writing objects: 100% (6/6), 660 bytes | 660.00 KiB/s, done.
Total 6 (delta 3), reused 0 (delta 0)
remote: Powered by GITEE.COM [GNK-3.8]
To https://gitee.com/owxc/cmake-examples-cn.git
   43173e6..0fde9d7  zh-cn -> zh-cn
PS C:\WORKSPACE\GITHUB\cmake-examples>

posts.title: Overview of Maverick
posts.text:
Overview
Maverick is a static blog generator built with python. Like Hexo and Jekyll, it takes Markdown(.md) files as input, and output beautifully formated and well structured website pages(.html). It has a lot built-in useful features(feed, search, sitemap, etc.), with extended Markdown syntax and enhanced image processing pipeline.If you are tired of intricate plugins and complicated configurations, just give Maverick a try. You focus on writing, let Maverick take care of the rest.Pull requests are surely welcome. If you have any questions or suggestions, please head to issue area and leave us a message. Before that, let's finish this document.Usage
Maverick is build with modern Python, currently at least Python 3.5 is required, make sure you have it installed on your machine.Install
Clone this repository:git clone https://github.com/AlanDecode/Maverick.git ./Maveric && cd ./Maveric

Install all dependencies:pip install -r prod_req.txt

If error occurs, please verify your Python and pip version. Then edit the default configuration file:vi ./config.py

For now let's use the default settings. Type this command in your terminal:python ./build.py

...and a sample static site is generated in test_dist folder! You can then upload them to GitHub Pages or any other server.Generate your own site
By default, Maverick searches all .md files recursively under test_src folder, so put your Markdown files in it and run python ./build.py then everything you need will be in test_dist folder. Maverick uses so-called YAML frontmatter to get meta data of your articles, if you have tried Hexo or Jekyll, you should be familiar with it; if you don't, let's look into it now.......Read the full documentation here.License
MIT © AlanDecode.

posts.title: Typography
posts.text:
This is an sample article. Typography matters in Maverick.
L2 Heading
L3 Heading
L4 Heading
L5 Heading
L6 Heading
Paragraph
We are creating a world that all may enter without privilege or prejudice accorded by race, economic power, military force, or station of birth.We are creating a world where anyone, anywhere may express his or her beliefs, no matter how singular, without fear of being coerced into silence or conformity.Inline elements
Bold, Ruby(ルビ), Italic, Strikethrough, Link1。Blockquote and nested blockquote

安得广厦千万间，大庇天下寒士俱欢颜！风雨不动安如山。
呜呼！何时眼前突兀见此屋，吾庐独破受冻死亦足！

Code
Inline code: int a=1;. Code block:int main(int argc , char** argv){
    std::cout << "Hello World!\n";
    return 0;
}

List
Unordered List

iPhone
iPhone X
iPhone 11


iPad
MacBook

Ordered List

打开冰箱
右手放在冰箱门拉手上
左手扶住冰箱主体
右手向后用力


把大象放进冰箱
关上冰箱

Horizontal rule

Math
Inline Math: $m\times n$, math block:$$C_{m\times k}=A_{m\times n}\cdot B_{n\times k}$$
Figures
Single figure
Princess MononokePhotoset
    Table



  header
  header




  cell 1
  cell 2


  cell 3
  cell 4



Link Card

                          AlanDecode

pages.title: About
pages.text:
Maverick is a static blog generator built with python. Like Hexo and Jekyll, it takes Markdown(.md) files as input, and output beautifully formated and well structured website pages(.html). It has a lot built-in useful features(feed, search, sitemap, etc.), with extended Markdown syntax and enhanced image processing pipeline.If you are tired of intricate plugins and complicated configurations, just give Maverick a try. You focus on writing, let Maverick take care of the rest.Pull requests are surely welcome. If you have any questions or suggestions, please head to issue area and leave us a message. Before that, let's finish this document.Contact
Email: hi#imalan.cn (replace # with @)Telegram：AlanDecode
